flavorText: The passing of the sai presages the end of the old clan and the ascent of the new.
name: Sai of the Shinobi

rulings.text: If you choose not to attach Sai of the Shinobi to a creature that enters the battlefield, or if you can’t (most likely because the creature has left the battlefield by the time the triggered ability resolves), Sai of the Shinobi doesn’t move.
